Text: Im downloading now, and when its done ill seed with about 40-50kbps, sorry about that, my line sux :/

somebody please seed this, I really need os 8 and it's not like you can go to best buy and purchase a copy! Apple should kill this version off and offer it on their FTP like system 7!
Could some 1 plz plz plz seed im stuck on  99.5% thanks

phew.. it took more than a week for the last 0.5 % to finish :)
but, there is no sound, unfortunately :(

SOUND FIX!

To enable sound open the hard drive look for the old Sound control panel, located in the \Apple Extras\Sound Control Panel folder; set Sound Out to Built-in, and you're in business.

credit http://lowendmac.com/mac2win/08m2w/sheepshaver-for-mac-os-x.html

This is pretty awesome actually now.  A few simple tweaks and this would be idiot proof.  As is, it's annoying having to manually config lots of stuff since the built in config gui leaves something to be desired and the updated versions around the net don't work on 64 bit windows.
thx SAK!! and griffinmills for the sound problem fix!! :)))
